local_intent: Perceive white_plate if needed, perform precision approach and alignment, descend until contact, close gripper, verify object secured.
assumptions: Gripper is open and responsive (preceding OpenGripper executed)
Camera can observe the white_plate or ScanForTarget can locate it
Safe descend depths available (max_depth chosen from allowed distance values)
coherence_with_global: Refines the global 'approach' phase: ensures visibility (with retry/scan), runs DetectObject, executes ApproachAndAlign with conservative tolerance, descends until contact and secures the white_plate, then verifies ObjectInGripper consistent with the MainTree sequence.
